name: imessage-max
description: AI-optimized MCP server for iMessage on macOS. Read, search, and send messages with contact resolution.
long_description: iMessage Max provides intent-aligned tools for AI assistants to interact with your iMessage conversations. Features include contact name resolution, session grouping, full-text search, and token-efficient responses designed for AI consumption.

tools.name: find_chat
tools.description: Find chats by participants, name, or recent content

tools.name: get_context
tools.description: Get messages surrounding a specific message

tools.name: send
tools.description: Send a message to person or group

tools.name: list_attachments
tools.description: Retrieve attachments by type, person, chat
